Trade/Device Name(s): Kawasumi Multiple Sample Adapter with Pre-Attached Holder (MBCH)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Kawasumi Multiple Sample Adapter with Pre-Attached Holder (MBCH), a sterile, single-use blood specimen collection accessory connecting to female luer systems
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, noninvasive device for connection with a female luer system and non-needle devices to collect blood specimen into blood collection tubes
